alert.note: Alert for Brown; Redwood (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 24 at 12:32PM CDT until October 24 at 1:15PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: The National Weather Service in the Twin Cities has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Redwood County in southwestern Minnesota... Southwestern Brown County in south central Minnesota... * Until 115 PM CDT. * At 1232 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Walnut Grove, or 20 miles northeast of Slayton, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Springfield, Walnut Grove, Lamberton, Comfrey, Sanborn, and Revere. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
